properties.name: Be Brave
properties.description: A simple game demo made for uni project

events.comment: Change to respective scenes when click on the buttons
Go to respective levels when clicked, but only allowed if the previous level passed is true

objects.name: ControlsText
objects.string:
Move left - Left arrow key or A
Move right - Right arrow key or D
Jump - Space
Interact - E
Read Sign - R
Pause - Esc

content.text:

Interact - E

objects.name: Story
objects.string:
In a world where magic solves most problems, a rare illness afflicts your family member beyond the reach of spells. 

Determined to find a cure, you embark on a perilous ascent of a mystical mountain rumored to bear a miraculous Healing Bloom. 

The mountain, infused with magical elements, has many floating platforms and magic plant. 

You navigate this treacherous terrain, driven by love and the hope of healing your loved one. 

Each leap brings you closer to the elusive flower, symbolizing resilience in the face of adversity and the discovery of untapped magical potential.

content.text:
In a world where magic solves most problems, a rare illness afflicts your family member beyond the reach of spells. 

Determined to find a cure, you embark on a perilous ascent of a mystical mountain rumored to bear a miraculous Healing Bloom. 

The mountain, infused with magical elements, has many floating platforms and magic plant. 

You navigate this treacherous terrain, driven by love and the hope of healing your loved one. 

Each leap brings you closer to the elusive flower, symbolizing resilience in the face of adversity and the discovery of untapped magical potential.
